text: "Stay" is a 1960 song by Maurice Williams and the Zodiacs and topped the charts in the United States, number 14 in the United Kingdom and number 4 in New Zealand. It went on covered by The Dave Clark Five, The Hollies, Jackson Browne, Bruce Springsteen and Cyndi Lauper. ==Jackson Browne version== The Jackson Browne released a version for his fifth studio album Running on Empty. The song is a follow-up track to The Load-Out. It made number 20 in the United States, number 10 in New Zealand, number 12 in the United Kingdom, number 58 in Australia and number 19 in Canada. ==References== Category:1960 songs Category:Doo-wop songs Category:Soft rock songs Category:The Four Seasons (band) songs Category:The Dave Clark Five songs Category:The Hollies songs Category:Jan & Dean songs Category:Andrew Gold songs Category:Jackson Browne songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs Category:Cyndi Lauper songs
title: Stay (Maurice Williams song)
